The Girl Who Talks to the Moon is a locally produced children&#8217;s program combining live action, stop-motion animation and charming puppetry. Aimed at a young audience, [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Tue, 19 Dec 2017 16:12:58 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16327947.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Haida-based CBC pilot The Girl Who Talks to the Moon about fun and respect" href="http://edmontonjournal.com/entertainment/television/haida-based-cbc-pilot-the-girl-who-talks-to-the-moon-about-fun-and-respect" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16348301</guid><link>http://nationalpost.com/entertainment/television/what-to-watch-on-netflix-and-cravetv-over-the-holidays</link><title>What to watch on Netflix and CraveTV over the holidays</title><description>How many times is too many times to watch Netflix's A Christmas Prince? What privacy? Back in the day, when TV viewers fancied a little onscreen indulgence &#8212; maybe even with a scandalous scene or two &#8212; their sole choice was to partake at home, with only the dog around to lay [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Mon, 18 Dec 2017 13:00:28 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16348206.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16320232</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/calgary+raised+paul+hyung+finding+appa/16320232/story.html</link><title>Calgary-raised Paul Sun-Hyung Lee on finding his Appa in Kim's Convenience</title><description>It was during his early days as Appa in Ins Choi&#8217;s hit play Kim&#8217;s Convenience that Paul Sun-Hyung Lee realized just how convincing he was in the part. At a Toronto Q&A held after a performance a few years back, Lee said he heard something like a gasp from the audience when he began speaking. [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Sat, 16 Dec 2017 13:13:17 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16320233.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Calgary-raised Paul Sun-Hyung Lee on finding his Appa in Kim's Convenience" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/television/calgary-raised-paul-sun-hyung-lee-on-finding-his-appa-in-kims-convenience" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16317243</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/celebrity/hallmark+channel+wraps+holidays+vancouver+style/16317243/story.html</link><title>Hallmark Channel wraps up the holidays, Vancouver style</title><description>It takes some special skills to be in a Hallmark Channel holiday movie. &#8220;You learn while you are bundled up in a coat and gloves and a hat and sweating a lot how to do that little cold shiver, when it is 90 degrees out,&#8221; laughed actor Danica McKellar about the common practice of filming [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Sat, 16 Dec 2017 03:52:55 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16317244.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Hallmark Channel wraps up the holidays, Vancouver style" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/celebrity/hallmark-channel-wraps-up-the-holidays-vancouver-style" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16318043</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/books/town+talk+soon+abdicate+emperor+akihito+birthday/16318043/story.html</link><title>Town Talk: Soon-to-abdicate Emperor Akihito's birthday celebrated</title><description>84 CANDLES: Japanese Canadians and others filled the Bayshore hotel&#8217;s ballroom recently at a birthday party for Emperor Akihito, who will be 84 on Dec. 23. It was a bittersweet celebration because of the previous day&#8217;s official acceptance of his request to abdicate on April 30 in favour of Crown Prince Naruhito. So said Consul [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 15 Dec 2017 20:00:49 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16318044.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Town Talk: Soon-to-abdicate Emperor Akihito's birthday celebrated" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/television/town-talk-soon-to-abdicate-emperor-akihitos-birthday-celebrated" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16316286</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/kevin+tierney+national+distinctly+american+look/16316286/story.html</link><title>Kevin Tierney: CBC's new National has a distinctly American look</title><description>There seems to be no compelling reason for having four hosts for CBC&#8217;s new-format 10 p.m. national news.</description><source>Entertainment - The Riverdale TV series star loves the great outdoors and good restaurants. Oh, and her nine-year-old daughter is named Rain. &#8220;I know it&#8217;s awesome, right,&#8221; said Nichols, who plays Veronica&#8217;s mother Hermione Lodge on the weekly Vancouver-shot drama. &#8220;It&#8217;s perfect. She loves it. [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Tue, 05 Dec 2017 18:26:14 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/15904502.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Marisol Nichols fully embraces Vancouver and her Riverdale role" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/television/marisol-nichols-fully-embraces-vancouver-and-her-riverdale-role" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16134375</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/yule+watch+these+holiday+specials/16134375/story.html</link><title>Yule watch these 11 holiday TV specials</title><description>As sure as Rudolph&#8217;s red nose is a beacon of cheer, and not the result of some seasonal infection, holiday TV specials abound. There&#8217;s something this year for just about everyone: classic films, live productions, musical extravaganzas and even puppy-filled [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Tue, 05 Dec 2017 17:24:29 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16134376.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16132979</guid><link>http://nationalpost.com/entertainment/television/who-will-take-the-lead-in-house-of-cards-final-season</link><title>Who will take the lead in House of Cards’ final season?</title><description>Rumours have swirled for weeks how the final season might play out, with Netflix even having axed Spacey from all promotional materials on the website</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Mon, 04 Dec 2017 20:19:57 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16100606.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="What to watch on Netflix and CraveTV this week" href="http://nationalpost.com/entertainment/television/what-to-watch-on-netflix-and-cravetv-this-week-4" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16058045</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/calgary+born+comedian+ophira+eisenberg+dreaming/16058045/story.html</link><title>Calgary-born comedian Ophira Eisenberg dreaming of a Judeo-Christmas in new documentary</title><description>When Ophira Eisenberg was a child growing up in Calgary, she asked her parents who it was that brought Jewish children Hanukkah presents. Her mother said it was Moses. Apparently, the white-bearded prophet came down from the mountain each year and handed out dreidels and socks to good boys and girls. &#8220;There was always these [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Sat, 02 Dec 2017 13:15:42 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16058046.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Calgary-born comedian Ophira Eisenberg dreaming of a Judeo-Christmas in new documentary" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/television/calgary-born-comedian-ophira-eisenberg-dreaming-of-a-judeo-christmas-in-new-documentary" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16028919</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/mary+walsh+unveils+hatching+matching+dispatching/16028919/story.html</link><title>Mary Walsh unveils Hatching, Matching, & Dispatching TV movie</title><description>Mary Walsh insists she&#8217;s not obscene. Delightfully profane, sure. Certain to put some pink in your cheek and a tickle in your tummy, even. But flat-out vulgar? No effing way. And when her CBC sitcom Hatching, Matching, & Dispatching debuted [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 01 Dec 2017 19:10:48 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16028920.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16011126</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/celebrity/dozens+animators+lost+jobs+after+louis+admitted/16011126/story.html</link><title>Dozens of B.C. animators lost jobs after Louis C.K. admitted to sexual misconduct</title><description>'I may be suffering a little bit, but in the long run, hopefully that small amount of suffering will make a bigger change in the industry'</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Thu, 30 Nov 2017 21:47:34 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16011129.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Dozens of B.C. animators lost jobs after Louis C.K. admitted to sexual misconduct" href="http://vancouversun.com/news/local-news/dozens-of-b-c-animators-lost-jobs-after-louis-c-k-admitted-to-sexual-misconduct" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16007912</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/news/local+news/riverdale+brings+2460m+boost+more+than+2c000+jobs+film/16007912/story.html</link><title>Riverdale brings $60M boost, more than 1,000 jobs to B.C. film economy</title><description>Betty Cooper&#8217;s ponytail is &#8220;iconic and beyond reproach,&#8221; to quote a recent Riverdale episode &#8211; and also a massive boost to B.C.&#8217;s film economy. According to an impact study released Wednesday, the CW&#8217;s breakout teen drama Riverdale has brought more than $60 million in spending and created more than 1,000 jobs in B.C. over two [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment -
